issue.title: Arrow 0.3 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-670](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-670). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As we near the next development milestone, please link issues that block the release so we can keep track of what needs to be done
